name: DegenAds
description: DegenAds.com offers a range of products for crypto traders, including real-time token charts and data tracking for meme coins. The platform is integrated with Tron SunPump, allowing users to track and trade meme coins on the Tron blockchain. It also supports Bitcoin metaprotocols like BRC-20 and Runes, providing a broader spectrum of token tracking. Additionally, DegenAds.com develops Telegram bots for features like price alerts and new pair notifications, helping traders stay updated on market movements.
